# W3659-220001: Tender for Dispersed Catering Services

### Title / Titre
Government Agency: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
End User: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Tender Information

*   **Tender Reference Number/Numéro de référence:** WS3981592204-Doc4051861628
*   **Amendment Number/Numéro de modification:** 2
*   **Publication Date / Date de publication:** 2023-06-13
*   **Tender Closing Date / Date limite d'appel d'offres:** 2023-06-29T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start/Fin Date / Date du début et de la fin de la souscription:** 2026-06-30
*   **Tender Status/Appel Offres Statut:** Expired
*   **Notice Type / Avis Type:** Request for Standing Offer (Standing Offer Request) - Demande d'offre à commandes - Demande d'offre à commandes

### Description

The government of Canada is issuing a tender for Dispersed Catering Services. The tender aims to provide catering services to the Department of National Defence. Interested offerors must clearly demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criteria. Failure to do so will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive.

## Trade Agreements

This tender falls under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB), which aims to promote Indigenous participation in the federal procurement process. To be qualified, suppliers must certify that they qualify as Indigenous businesses as defined under PSIB and must comply with the strategy's requirements.

## Tender Description

This tender is a Request for Standing Offer with an open bidding method. Interested offerors must submit their offers through [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16570115?extsite=MTY1NzAxMTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). The bid submission deadline is 2023-06-29 by 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be deemed non-responsive.

### Contract Information

*   **Expected Contract Duration:** 2026-06-30
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Handling Point:** Department of National Defence (DND)
